text: (Napiye!) Ivvare nam nam'mutaiya kattalaiyil anmavanatai (kur'anai) vahi mulamaka umakku arivittirukkirom; (atarku munnar) vetam enpato iman enpato ennavenru nir aripavaraka irukkavillai - eninum nam atai oliyaka akki, nam atiyarkalila nam virumpiyorukku itaik kontu nervali kattukirom - niccayamaka nir (makkalai) nerana pataiyil vali kanpikkinrir
